mapper.sql: t0.*,t1.fid orid,t1.organizationnumber ornumber,t1.organizationname orname,t2.fid stif,t2.stocknumber stnumber,t2.stockname stname, t3.fid guid,t3.username guname,t4.fid suid,t4.username suname,t5.fid crid,t5.username crname,t6.fid auid,t6.username auname, t7.fid cuid,t7.customnumber cunumber,t7.customname cuname,t8.fid feid,t8.fmaterialid,t8.flot,t8.fapplyqty,t8.frealqty,t8.finventory ,t8.fsendstockid,t8.fnote,t8.fid,t8.foid,t8.fentryid,t8.fbillid,t9.fid maid,t9.materialnumber manumber,t9.materialname maname, t9.materialmodel mamodel,t9.materialunit maunit,t10.fid estid,t10.stocknumber estnumber,t10.stockname estname
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from T_VS_BillGet t0 left join T_VS_Organization t1 on t0.fdepartmentid=t1.fid left join T_VS_Stock t2 on t0.fsendstockid=t2.fid left join T_VS_User t3 on t0.fgeterid=t3.fid left join T_VS_User t4 on t0.fsenderid=t4.fid left join T_VS_User t5 on t0.fcreaterid=t5.fid left join T_VS_User t6 on t0.fauditdate=t6.fid left join T_VS_Custom t7 on t0.fcustomid=t7.fid left join T_VS_BillGetEntry t8 on t0.fid=t8.fbillid left join T_VS_Material t9 on t8.fmaterialid=t9.fid left join T_VS_Stock t10 on t8.fsendstockid=t10.fid
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from T_VS_BillGet t0 left join T_VS_Organization t1 on t0.fdepartmentid=t1.fid left join T_VS_Stock t2 on t0.fsendstockid=t2.fid left join T_VS_User t3 on t0.fgeterid=t3.fid left join T_VS_User t4 on t0.fsenderid=t4.fid left join T_VS_User t5 on t0.fcreaterid=t5.fid left join T_VS_User t6 on t0.fauditdate=t6.fid left join T_VS_Custom t7 on t0.fcustomid=t7.fid left join T_VS_BillGetEntry t8 on t0.fid=t8.fbillid left join T_VS_Material t9 on t8.fmaterialid=t9.fid left join T_VS_Stock t10 on t8.fsendstockid=t10.fid where t0.fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
